Almost awesome, but the bitrate is just a hair too low, and there's noticeable artifacting.  

You'd be better off with a crisp SD version than an artifacted HD one, I think.  If it had been at just a slightly higher bitrate or slightly lower resolution, it probably would have been fine.

@LackThereof

thanks, i would try to do a better one next time. so far, my best work is 500 days of summer and the shooter, i will try to maintain the good standard and get a better source next time
